availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Christopher "Columbus" Chamberlin (Jefferson County, Kentucky, tax assessor and notary public)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, tax assessor and notary public. Maryland native. Married to Mary Ann Phelps Chamberlin in Clark County, Indiana, on October 28, 1843. Father of H.B. Chamberlin. Tax assessor in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1862. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1862. Assistant tax assessor in Jefferson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 9, p. 228A.
Indiana Marriage Records, Clark County Courthouse, Jeffersonville, Indiana, Clark County Marriages, Film #004476596, vol. E, p. 48.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994041, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 19.
"U.S. Internal Revenue," The Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), June 1, 1863.
"Columbus Chamberlin (1823-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #97552751, accessed November 3, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97552751.
KYR-0001-031-0056.
